subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets concluded an 11-day trip with their sixth straight loss, a 6-4 defeat by the Giants. Catcher Travis d’Arnaud was demoted to Class AAA Las Vegas.
snippet: The Mets concluded an 11-day trip with their sixth straight loss, a 6-4 defeat by the Giants. Catcher Travis d’Arnaud was demoted to Class AAA Las Vegas.
